dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3045451D] DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up woofersetc.com/Sony Mobile
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, February 12, 2007 3:22 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3045451D] DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up woofersetc.com/Sony Mobile ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up woofersetc.com/Sony Mobile Added by system at Monday, Feb 12 2007 09:21 am X-MailFrom: bdavis@netenforcers.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Feb 12 09:20:57 2007 Received: (qmail 1171 invoked by alias); 12 Feb 2007 15:20:57 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 1168 invoked from network); 12 Feb 2007 15:20:57 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 12 Feb 2007 15:20:57 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 12 Feb 2007 09:20:57 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 12 Feb 2007 09:20:57 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from bdavis@netenforcers.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HGczA-0007fm-TV for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 12 Feb 2007 09:20:56 -0600 Received: from outbound.mse9.exchange.ms ([69.25.50.217]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from bdavis@netenforcers.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HGcz3-000Ist-0l for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 12 Feb 2007 09:20:49 -0600 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C74EB9.36191E13" Subject: DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up woofersetc.com/Sony Mobile Date: Mon, 12 Feb 2007 10:19:40 -0500 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up woofersetc.com/Sony Mobile Thread-Index: AcdOuTdCx7ga1xohSGiD4cBqVUPoAA== From: "Barbara Davis" To: Cc: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 12 Feb 2007 15:20:57.0121 (UTC) FILETIME=[64D90910:01C74EB9] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) To whom it may concern, This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent to you regarding your client www.woofersetc.com and our client Sony Mobile. Your client received a DMCA Notification informing them of the unauthorized use of copyrighted images and trademarked logos. They received this letter on 01/29/2007 and were given eight (8) days to comply. The website has been rechecked and I am showing your client has yet to comply. Please provide me with a follow-up on this by 02/14/2007. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me via email at Bdavis@netenforcers.com. Sincerely, Barbara Davis LMS Manager Net Enforcers Inc. BDavis@netenforcers.com compliance.management@netenforcers.com The Online Enforcement Specialists...... Statement of Confidentiality The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you. MIME element (text/html)

To whom it may concern,

 

This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent to you regarding your client www.woofersetc.com and our client Sony Mobile. Your client received a DMCA Notification informing them of the unauthorized use of copyrighted images and trademarked logos. They received this letter on 01/29/2007 and were given eight (8) days to comply. The website has been rechecked and I am showing your client has yet to comply. Please provide me with a follow-up on this by 02/14/2007. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me via email at Bdavis@netenforcers.com.< /o:p>

 

Sincerely,< o:p>

 

 

Barbara Davis

LMS Manager

Net Enforcers Inc.

BDavis@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com

 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

 

MIME element (text/plain)
